title: kAkka unakkirakkam
sahitya:
kAkka unakkirakkam illaiyA shrI kapAlIsha jAyE tAyE


anupallavi

  tUkkattilum unadu kAlinai marakkAda tozhumban tudippadoru vEDikkaiyA ennaik-


caraNam    annai nI enaith-taLLinAl vEru yAr tuNai paradEvaTE
unnaruLilaiyEl ivvulaga vAzhvil uyir Edu tiru uLLamariyAdO
